content: Dr Zheng Yuan | Computer Science | The University of Sheffield Skip to main content Search sheffield.ac.uk Close menu × School of Computer Science School of Computer Science Menu Dr Zheng Yuan School of Computer Science Senior Lecturer in Natural Language Processing Open staff member portrait in a modal window Zheng.Yuan1@sheffield.ac.uk Regent Court (DCS) Full contact details Dr Zheng Yuan School of Computer Science Regent Court (DCS) 211 Portobello Sheffield S1 4DP Orcid ID:0000-0003-2406-1708 Google Scholar Profile Zheng Yuan is a Senior Lecturer (Associate Professor) in Natural Language Processing (NLP) in the School of Computer Science at the University of Sheffield. Zheng is working on machine learning for natural language processing, including real-world applications in education, creativity, healthcare, social media, and finance. Before joining Sheffield, Zheng was a Lecturer in the Department of Informatics at King's College London, a Research Associate in the Department of Computer Science and Technology at the University of Cambridge, and a Fellow in Computer Science at Trinity College (Cambridge). Zheng holds a PhD in Natural Language Processing and an MPhil in Advanced Computer Science from the University of Cambridge, as well as a BSc(Eng) from Queen Mary University of London.
